description: Principles defining what makes a rule high-quality for training

principles.name: Novelty Over Redundancy
principles.description: Novel patterns are more valuable than variations of common patterns
implications: Novelty score reflects contribution to pattern coverage
Rare but valid patterns are valuable (not noise)

principles.name: Completeness Requirement
principles.description: Rules must have complete platform context for reproducibility
implications: Rules without context deprioritized in training

principles.name: Confidence Calibration
principles.description: Confidence scores must reflect genuine pattern clarity
implications: Over-confident rules are harmful to training
